thread.title: Blanchett's 'Carol' opens at London Film Festival
thread.title_full: Blanchett's 'Carol' opens at London Film Festival

title: Blanchett's 'Carol' opens at London Film Festival
text:
Blanchett's 'Carol' opens at London Film Festival Wednesday, October 14, 2015 - 01:07 
Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara attend the London Film Festival premiere of 'Carol.' Rough cut (no reporter narration)   
(ROUGH CUT - NO REPORTER NARRATION) STORY: Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara hit the red carpet for the opening of "Carol" at the London Film Festival. The movie, set in the 1950s, follows two women who fall in love despite their complicated circumstances. "I'm very proud of it. It's a labor of love for everyone involved and I think it's a very, very beautiful, hopefully touching film," said Blanchett. The film is slated to open in mid-November.  //reut.rs/1Mrqlfi
